sections.title: 1. General Terms
sections.content: Prive AI is an AI-powered tax consulting platform that provides users with tax-related advice. By completing a payment, the user agrees to this refund policy and acknowledges that refunds will not be granted in cases where the service has been properly and fully delivered.

sections.title: 2. Refund Eligibility
sections.content:
Prive AI issues refunds only under specific circumstances, as outlined below:

 2.1 Technical Malfunction
If a user is unable to access AI-based consultation due to a technical issue attributable to Prive AI, and the issue is not resolved within 7 business days, the user may request a full or partial refund.
2.2 Accidental or Duplicate Payment
If a user unintentionally purchases a package and requests cancellation within 12 hours, without having used the service, they will receive a full refund. Additionally, if a user is charged twice for the same service due to a system error, Prive AI will fully reimburse the duplicate charge.
2.3 Service Discontinuation or Modification 
If Prive AI discontinues a specific package or service, the user may request a proportional refund for any unused tokens.

sections.title: 3. Refund Process and Timeframes
sections.content:
To request a refund, the user must follow these steps:
1. Contact Prive AI’s support team at contact@priveai.ge 
2. Submit a request including proof of payment, the user’s name, and a detailed description of the issue. 
3. Prive AI will review the request within 5 business days.
4. If approved, the refund will be issued via the original payment method within 10 business days.

sections.title: 4. Exceptions and Non-Refundable Payments
sections.content:
Prive AI does not issue refunds in the following cases:
• The user successfully utilized the service and did not encounter any issues.
• The user purchased the wrong package but has already used the service.
• The user attempted to misuse the refund policy (e.g., submitting multiple refund requests for properly delivered services).
